title: China Tensions, GOP Stimulus, Mulan Boycott
itunes:title: China Tensions, GOP Stimulus, Mulan Boycott
description:
Guests: Tom Orlik, Bloomberg Economics Chief Economist, Trevor Hanger, Strategic Advisor with Forbes-Tate Partners in Washington, DC, David Tafuri, Former Obama Campaign Foreign Policy Adviser, Adam Goodman, Republican media strategist, columnist and partner at Ballard Partners in Washington, and New York Congressman Max Rose.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
